CustomField.formula: IF(AND($UserRole.Name='CRM TL 1',Owner:User.UserRole.Name='Channel relationship manager'),True, IF(AND($UserRole.Name='CRM TL 2',Owner:User.UserRole.Name='Channel Relationship Manager 2'),True, IF(AND($UserRole.Name='CRM TL3',Owner:User.UserRole.Name='Channel Relationship Manager 3'),True, IF(AND($UserRole.Name='CRM TL4',Owner:User.UserRole.Name='Channel Relationship Manager 4'),True,False))))
CustomField.label: My Team
